name: Motherboard (ChillGameDesign)
description:
Motherboard: The core has been damaged, and needs more power to function. Proceed to the central chamber to provide supplementary power.

Controls - mouse and keyboard

Move: WASD, look around with mouse

Interact: Left and right mouse buttons

Switch robots: 1, 2, and 3 keys

Gain energy: E key

Give energy: R key

Reset robot: T key
